title: Envelope Wallet with Gold Embroidery and Mirror Appliques Beaded envelope wallet

 animal material) metal thread cotton (textile) cord (fiber product) velvet (fabric weave) leather

  techniques_name: sewing (needleworking technique) embroidering

  object_colour: multicolored

  physical_appearance: This is a beaded velvet envelope wallet. There is an opening at the bottom. The face is decorated with embroidery of coloured beads. There is a border of geometric scroll pattern made of gold beads. In the center
 there is a depiction of a dragon
 made out of multicolored beads.

  subject_terms_1: beadwork (visual works) Peranakan motifs dragons

  subject_terms_2: Motifs Peranakan (Asian people) Wallets Beadwork Dragons

  subject_terms_3: Decorative arts

  sgcool_label_text: This envelope purse is lavishly embroidered with gold metallic thread. A figure of a dragon is magnificently depicted from its front using atas timbul. This technique required the use of sticks around which metal thread was wound.  The basket-weave texture that results is characteristic of this technique.

There is a border of geometric scroll pattern made of gold beads. In the center, there is a depiction of a dragon, made out of multicolored beads.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This envelope purse is lavishly embroidered with gold metallic thread. A figure of a dragon is magnificently depicted from its front using atas timbul. This technique required the use of sticks around which metal thread was wound.  The basket-weave texture that results is characteristic of this technique.
